name: JavaScript Function Hoisting Behavior Comparison Diagram
description: Compilation and execution phase diagram showing the difference between function declarations (fully hoisted) and function expressions (variable name hoisted, assignment stays in place), illustrating why timing of function calls matters.

name: JavaScript Function Hoisting Comparison Diagram
description: Diagram illustrating the difference between function declarations and function expressions during JavaScript's compilation and execution phases, showing how hoisting affects function availability
